languages.text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} received from a trap or a sudden large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If not removed with a medikit, it will {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} into an old injury. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or use medikit to remove the injury.
languages.original_text: Ранение, полученное в результате срабатывания ловушки или потери большого процента от запаса здоровья. Если не вылечить его с помощью медкомплекта, оно превратится в {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}старое ранение{/g}. Большое количество ранений снижает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажа и приводит к {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмам{/g}. Чтобы вылечить ранение, нужно посетить корабль или использовать медкомплект.

traits.locale_text: An injury received from a trap or a sudden large amount of damage. If not removed with a medikit, it will turn into an old injury. Too many injuries reduce the character's resolve and cause traumas. Visit the voidship or use medikit to remove the injury.

An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} received from a trap or a sudden large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If not removed with a medikit, it will {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} into an old injury. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or use medikit to remove the injury.

An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} received from a trap or a sudden large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If not removed with a medikit, it will {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} into an old injury. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or use medikit to remove the injury.

languages.text: Eine durch eine Falle oder plötzlichen hohen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursachte {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g}. Wird sie nicht mit einem Medikit entfernt, wird sie zu einer alten Verletzung. Zu viele Verletzungen verringern die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Charakters und führen zu {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g}. Besuche das Raumschiff oder nutze ein Medikit, um die Verletzung zu entfernen.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} received from a trap or a sudden large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If not removed with a medikit, it will turn into an old injury. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: Eine durch eine Falle oder eine plötzliche große Menge Schaden verursachte Verletzung. Wird sie nicht mit einem Medikit entfernt, wird sie zu einer alten Verletzung. Zu viele Verletzungen verringern die Entschlossenheit des Charakters und führen zu Traumata. Besuche das Raumschiff oder nutze ein Medikit, um die Verletzung zu entfernen.

Eine durch eine Falle oder plötzlichen hohen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursachte {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g}. Wird sie nicht mit einem Medikit entfernt, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}wird{/g} sie zu einer alten Verletzung. Zu viele Verletzungen verringern die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Charakters und führen zu {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g}. Besuche das Raumschiff oder nutze ein Medikit, um die Verletzung zu entfernen.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Lésion{/g} causée par un piège ou par d'importants {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} soudains. Si elle n'est pas soignée à l'aide d'un médikit, elle finit par se transformer en lésion ancienne. Un trop grand nombre de lésions réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage et provoque des {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatismes{/g}. Rendez-vous à bord du vaisseau spatial ou utilisez un médikit pour faire disparaître la lésion.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} received from a trap or a sudden large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If not removed with a medikit, it will turn into an old injury. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: Lésion causée par un piège ou par de gros dégâts soudains. Si elle n'est pas soignée à l'aide d'un médikit, elle finit par se transformer en lésion ancienne. Un trop grand nombre de lésions réduit la détermination du personnage et provoque des traumatismes. Rendez-vous à bord du vaisseau spatial ou utilisez le médikit pour faire disparaître la lésion.

languages.text: 如果角色落入陷阱或承受大量{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，则会受到{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}效果。新伤需要使用医疗包及时移除，否则就会成为旧伤。如果角色承受的伤势过多，不仅会降低{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，还会产生{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。 您可以前往虚空舰治愈伤口，或使用医疗包移除伤口。
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} received from a trap or a sudden large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If not removed with a medikit, it will turn into an old injury. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: 如果角色落入陷阱或承受大量伤害，则会受到“新伤”效果。新伤需要使用医疗包及时移除，否则就会成为旧伤。如果角色承受的伤势过多，不仅会降低决心，还会产生创伤。 您可以前往虚空舰治愈伤口，或使用医疗包移除伤口。

如果角色落入陷阱或承受大量{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}，则会受到{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}效果。新伤需要使用医疗包及时移除，否则就会成为旧伤。如果角色承受的伤势过多，不仅会降低{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，还会产生{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。 您可以前往虚空舰治愈伤口，或使用医疗包移除伤口。

languages.text: Una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} sufrida por una trampa o una gran cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} repentino. Si no se trata con un botiquín, se convertirá en una lesión vieja. Un exceso de lesiones reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del personaje y causa {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g}. Visita la nave del vacío o usa un botiquín para tratar la lesión.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} received from a trap or a sudden large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If not removed with a medikit, it will turn into an old injury. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: Una lesión sufrida por una trampa o una gran cantidad de daño repentino. Si no se trata con un botiquín, se convertirá en una lesión vieja. Un exceso de lesiones reduce la firmeza del personaje y causa aflicciones. Visita la nave del vacío o usa un botiquín para tratar la lesión.

languages.text: 罠や突然の大{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}傷{/g}。メディキットで取り除かなければ、古傷に{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}なってしまう{/g}。傷が多すぎると、キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が弱まり、{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}を引き起こす。 ヴォイドシップを訪れるかメディキットで傷を取り除く。
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} received from a trap or a sudden large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If not removed with a medikit, it will {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} into an old injury. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: 罠や突然の大ダメージによる傷。メディキットで取り除かなければ、古傷になってしまう。傷が多すぎると、キャラクターの決断力が弱まり、外傷を引き起こす。 ヴォイドシップを訪れるかメディキットで傷を取り除く。

罠や突然の大{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}傷{/g}。メディキットで取り除かなければ、古傷に{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}なってしまう{/g}。傷が多すぎると、キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が弱まり、{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}を引き起こす。 ヴォイドシップを訪れるかメディキットで傷を取り除く。

languages.text: Ранение, полученное в результате срабатывания ловушки или потери большого процента от запаса здоровья. Если не вылечить его с помощью медкомплекта, оно превратится в {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}старое ранение{/g}. Большое количество ранений снижает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажа и приводит к {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмам{/g}. Чтобы вылечить ранение, нужно посетить корабль или использовать медкомплект.
languages.original_text: An injury received from a trap or great damage. If not removed with a medikit, it will turn into an old injury. Too many injuries reduce the character's resolve and cause traumas. Visit the voidship or use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: Ранение, полученное в результате срабатывания ловушки или потери большого процента от запаса здоровья. Если не вылечить его с помощью медкомплекта, оно превратится в старое ранение. Большое количество ранений снижает решимость персонажа и приводит к травмам. Чтобы вылечить ранение, нужно посетить корабль или использовать медкомплект.

Ранение, полученное в результате срабатывания ловушки или потери большого процента от запаса здоровья. Если не вылечить его с помощью медкомплекта, оно превратится в старое ранение. Большое количество ранений снижает решимость персонажа и приводит к травмам. Чтобы вылечить ранение, нужно посетить корабль или использовать медкомплект.

languages.text: Bir tuzağa veya aniden yüksek miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalma sonucu oluşan bir {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlık{/g}. Sıhhiye çantası ile müdahale edilmezse eski sakatlığa dönüşür. Çok fazla sakatlık, karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılığını{/g} düşürür ve {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travmalara{/g} sebep olur. Sakatlığı gidermek için uçsuz gemisine uğra veya sıhhiye çantası kullan.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} received from a trap or a sudden large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If not removed with a medikit, it will turn into an old injury. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: Bir tuzağa veya aniden yüksek miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalma sonucu oluşan bir {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlık{/g}. Sıhhiye çantası ile müdahale edilmezse eski sakatlığa dönüşür. Çok fazla sakatlık, karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılığını{/g} düşürür ve {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travmalara{/g} sebep olur. Sakatlığı gidermek için uçsuz gemisine uğra veya sıhhiye çantası kullan.
